alert.note: Alert for Athens; Gallia; Jackson; Meigs; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:42AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Meigs, northern Gallia, Jackson, Vinton and western Athens Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 441 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hocking Hills State Park to near Oak Hill. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Athens, Jackson, Wellston, Nelsonville, Glouster, Mcarthur, Oak Hill, Rio Grande, Albany, Rutland, Lake Hope State Park, Middleport, Chauncey, Hamden, Buchtel, Jacksonville, Coalton, Murray City, Trimble, and Zaleski. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building until the storms pass. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
